string.text:
Entry 1: "... at the same time, we watched the whole process from beginning to end, despite the fact that the Monolith fighters surrounded the 'Springboard' in a tight ring, trying to close off any possible observation of the transmutation process and the artifact itself. But Artyom was in a rather advantageous position, and he managed to examine the artifact thrown into the anomaly through binoculars. It turned out to be a 'Snotty Porcupine' (a strange name, but it is the original one given by the creator stalker. We verified this data). Nine hours later, already at night, the anomaly threw the artifact back out. Now we have to take it from the Monoliths. Artyom suggested doing this during their next prayer to the 'Monolith'. It will start in 40 minutes. After returning, I want to put in a good word for this sensible guy. Vladislav Leonidovich, I think you will support..." 

Entry 2: "... I will dump the data in fragments to a flash drive, duplicate it. We dealt with the Monoliths quite quickly while they were performing some strange ritual around a black rectangle brought by one of them instead of a backpack (I initially thought it was a satchel, but it turned out to be a portable altar (!); Vladislav Leonidovich, I think this fact will be of interest to both Russian and foreign colleagues). Artyom opened fire from his 'Vintorez', and I added a couple of grenades from the underbarrel launcher. The main fears, to our joy, were not justified. The modified artifact remained unharmed. After two days of our trek, I noted the following qualities of the 'Stone Porcupine' (we gave the name considering its properties and origin from the 'Snotty Porcupine'): this artifact, which I would classify as an absolute, reduces the radiation dose received by a person by 50 mSv/hr! Besides this rarest quality, the 'Stone Porcupine' reduces a person's sensitivity to electric shock, effectively reduces bleeding, and adds stamina..." 

Entry 3: "... we are being chased. Monoliths, about fifteen people. We tried to break away – it didn't work. They are gradually squeezing us in a ring. I will leave the flash drive with the duplicate information to Artyom Inkin, and I will try to delay the pursuers myself..."

Entry 1: "... they took me at the exit from the village... I got five of them... we didn't even manage to send a bearing. The rapid response group is still sitting in waiting... They shot off Andrey Semyonovich's leg just below the knee right before my eyes. Bitches! They led us for a long time. I carried the wounded Andrey Semyonovich. I didn't even know they had an underground stash here. These cattle said we would answer for killing their brothers... Andrey Semyonovich was thrown into the neighboring cage. He was already unconscious then... they untied my hands and didn't even take my PDA or backpack, only weapons and ammo..." 

Entry 2: "... I don't know what it is... I don't know... it's not a bloodsucker, it's not a chimera... it's not... It crawled out of the pit to their singing! They opened the door of the cage with Andrey Semyonovich... it didn't touch them. It immediately moved to the cage... it crawled in there... and... AND STARTED DEVOURING HIM! AND HE WAS STILL ALIVE AND SCREAMING!!! IT WAS GNAWING HIS FACE, AND HE WAS WHEEZING AND TRYING WITH HIS HANDS..." 

Entry 3: "... it will come... the Monoliths left, but it sits there in the ground... I hear its thoughts. They left and opened the door of my cage... and it went down and talks to me from there and... and Andrey Semyonovich speaks... in my head. I will leave... I'll only take Andrey Semyonovich's hand... he says that at least the hand - that's already good... it... is important, very important... and it... doesn't come out... it glows down there... in the pit... like a rainbow... and tells me not to go anywhere.... but I will leave... they didn't even close the door... they said it wouldn't let me crawl out... but it went to its place after gnawing on Andrey Semyonovich... only left the hand... Andrey Semyonovich says I should leave now... while it is thinking down there... And I took the hand... because it is important to him..."

Entry 4: "I tricked it... it is stupid... I took Andrey Semyonovich's hand and the backpack... and walked. It started roaring and crawling out... but suddenly stopped. I told it that I really need to go out. It believed me and didn't follow me further! It only roared for a long time and glowed in the dark... I TRICKED IT! I tricked it..."

Entry 1: "Found a dead stalker. Or rather what was left of him near a 'Springboard'. He had a 'Kolobok' in his backpack, but a weird one. Glowing, the nuisance. I brainstormed and decided to throw my 'Kolobok' into the 'Springboard' and see what happens. Pity, of course, could have got a lot of booze for it, but... to hell with it, I'll try." 

Entry 2: "Sitting for three hours now, waiting. Whacked a lonely zombie. I wasted the 'Kolobok' feeding it to this anomaly, oh wasted it!" 

Entry 3: "Yes! It flew out, dear one, like a cork! Five hours passed, and here it is. It's glowing! This calls for a drink!" 

Entry 4: "Whew! That was close! I'll walk around the Zone drunk for sure. If I was sober, I'd definitely be dead! Ran into a bandit. He blasted at me from a PM, but his gun jammed right after the shot. So this scum pulled out a knife and slashed me. I laid him out with the sawed-off, the bitch!" 

Entry 5: "It's not that simple. Something doesn't add up. For example, I remember exactly when the bandit shot at me, the bullet seemed to go away. It didn't hit the head, but as if it was blown aside... and with the knife, he easily ripped my leather jacket. I remember the blade strike, but only a scratch on the belly. Maybe my 'Koloboks' helped me? 'Steel Koloboks'... And they radiate, the round nuisances. Hmm, but 'Steel Balls' would sound cooler..."

Saracen dragged in some captured rookie. Says he didn't whack him immediately because this rookie was looking around very amusingly, as if carrying something very valuable. Stubborn brat! We felt an interesting 'Kolobok' in his backpack. Well, like a 'Kolobok'... kind of is, kind of isn't. Asked him what kind of beast he has in his backpack. Kept silent like a partisan. I respect that! Although he looks like a wimp! Swede broke a couple of his fingers before he told what's what. Says it's a 'Steel Kolobok' changed in a 'Whirligig'. Like, it lies there for five hours and becomes different. Says it protects from bullets not bad, again saves not bad from rupture and fire. But, damn, it's radioactive. Came up with a cool name for it – 'Titanium Kolobok'! Need to check if this fraer told the truth or not. Just need to find a 'Steel Kolobok'...

This hyper-modificate, obtained by transmuting the 'Titanium Kolobok' meso-modificate in a 'Fruit Punch' anomaly, gives the skin of the person wearing it resistance to rupture, reduces the effect of fire and chemically aggressive environment, and with its field 'diverts' part of the bullets. The downside of this rather useful hyper-modificate is that it emits radiation.

May He abide in Eternity! May He change the World! \n\nMentor Victor announced another success of his naturalists! The Mentor, like all of us, is sure that He again presented us, His followers, a gift to strengthen our faith! After a skirmish with a squad of military guarding scientists, phalanx leader Ostakh brought a 'Shell' with bodies and trophies. Together with the bodies of the misguided, it was sacrificed to His Flame. But Watchers Brother Akim and Brother Lekho discovered the 'Shell' falling out of the 'Burner' after six hours. It glowed unusually, which confirmed the Watchers in His sign. This changed 'Shell' went through two skirmishes together with naturalist Brother Roman. On the way back, his phalanx encountered and accepted battle with four burers in the catacombs. Brother Roman claims that this changed 'Shell' worked miracles – Brother Roman almost didn't feel the psi-attacks of the burers! Besides this, the artifact somehow removed a large portion of radiation that Brother Roman received. He also noticed that all the time he wore this artifact, he didn't want to eat. Truly, He gives us particles of Eternity even now! Further experiments showed that this artifact, which received the name 'Controller's Scalp' from the Qualitet, improves well-being and saves from chemical burns. Our faith grows and strengthens day by day! For He remembers us! May He abide in Eternity! May He change the World!

... anyway, it was like this: On the night of July seventh, half a month ago. In short, in building #3 a 'Connecting Rod' surfaced - a wandering 'Burner' anomaly, damn it. I remained alone in this building. Max and Yurka Sevastopol left, although how - I still don't get it... we drank heavily. Just as I gathered to make a bed in the corner – opa! Fire from the wall! I was drunk and at first thought that Timur Marinade fixed the found infantry flamethrower and is pranking with it. Then thought that a gas pipe burst in the walls, there was a kitchen behind the wall once. Then remembered that gas here, in the pipes, ran out fifteen years ago. Got confused a little, started pouring water. But when I saw the flame moving along the wall, I realized, but it was too late. I managed to rip my HK G36 off the nail, but not the bag with the 'Soul' found two days ago. I was very upset, drank. And four hours later my 'Soul' falls out of the fire! Only glows funny, like a lamp. Well, I grabbed it and into the container. Woke up in the morning, look: the guys are roasting a boar on the 'Burner'. 

Here I immediately remembered about the 'Soul'. Warned Max, and trudged to the eggheads. Getting there was fun. Well, that's another story. Got there, gave this 'Soul' for measurements. Sakhar scratched his bald head for a long time after them. "The artifact, besides improving human health," - he says, - "has gained the ability to reduce radiation dose". Also, this art (I named it 'Soul Drop', sounds cool) adds fatigue. Sakhar tried to persuade me to sell it for a long time, but I didn't buy it. I already had a plan born by that time: throw this art into the 'Burner' one more time and see what happens, and then bring it to Sakhar for measurements again. He scratched his skull for a long time again, but agreed. I took my 'Soul Drop' and moved to the tunnel. There are tons of these 'Burners' there. Threw it, waiting. After six hours it started to appear, but wouldn't jump out of the anomaly. Barely got it out, got singed. Almost became as bald as Sakhar. Brought it for measurement and turned out right! This art (I named it 'Fiery Soul') began to protect from radiation twice as well! No, I shouldn't have skipped entering the institute. I'd be a professor, an academician there... 

Anyway, I went to the 'Burner' for the third time, like, damn, the Old Man to the blue sea. On the way dropped a couple of zombies. One turned out to be former Mikha Cameroon. I drank for his peace later. What a fate, bitch! Just a month ago I drank with him, and today a bullet in the head... may the earth be... I threw the 'Fiery Soul' into the 'Burner' and started waiting again. Only very long. It jumped out only after 10 hours (good thing I didn't have to poke into the anomaly this time). I managed to take a nap during this time... Glows so joyfully. I picked up the art and moved to the eggheads. There's already a whole brigade on alert there, feeding me coffee with cognac, fussing with the artifact themselves. I came up with a name for it under the secular mood with coffee and Hennessy – 'Crystal Soul'. The eggheads are gasping there, admiring, saying that this hyp... hyperdif... anyway, 'Crystal Soul' both improves health and received some unprecedented indicator for radiation protection. In the morning I easily got to the 'Burner' again. Threw my precious 'Crystal Soul' into the anomaly. 

Waited long. Look - the art jumped out. I didn't understand anything, the glow didn't change a damn bit. Well, I think, to hell with you, if you don't want to - don't. Started walking back, look – a wandering 'Electro' is coming in the passage. No way to pass. I sat, sat, then I think: "Let me throw my art into the 'Electro'"! Turned out like in the 'Burner' – it disappeared there and jumped back out in just an hour. The light coming off is completely different! I waited for the 'Electro' to migrate further, and went my way. Brought the 'Crystal Soul' to Yantar, gave it to Sakhar. He was gone for a long time. Comes out of the lab, eyes glowing behind glasses, really like a psycho. Says it's some kind of absolute. If previously trans... transm..., anyway, the changed 'Soul' reduced human stamina, then this art besides health improvement and radiation protection, increases, not decreases stamina. I made decent dough from the eggheads for studying my 'Soul' then...

The artifact 'Droplet' is placed in the 'Electro' anomaly. The obtained modificate 'Electro Tears' removes radiation from the human body (doses up to 10 mSv/hr are tolerated without consequences), and also slightly relieves fatigue. No negative effect on the human body recorded.

The modificate 'Electro Tears' is placed in the 'Burner' anomaly. The obtained meso-modificate 'Fire Tears' quite well removes radiation from the body of a person wearing this artifact on the belt (limit dose 30±2 mSv/hr). Negative impact not recorded.

The meso-modificate 'Fire Tears' is placed in the 'Fruit Punch' anomaly. This hyper-modificate, besides removing radiation from the body very well, is also useful because it blocks almost half of psi-radiation. Negative characteristics of 'Chimera Tears' - deterioration of human well-being and poor wound healing.

For mandatory reading. 

Fighters! Our scientist comrades provided information about the possibility of changing the artifact 'Mama's Beads' with subsequent acquisition of new characteristics. This artifact is subject to change only in the 'Electro' anomaly, in which the artifact must be placed for five hours. After that, it receives new characteristics with a high probability. I quote from the scientists' document: "The obtained modificate increases the stamina indicator and generates a temporal field, quite significantly slowing down the speed of bullets hitting it, thereby protecting a person from critical wounds. Slightly radioactive and decreases resistance to electric shock." 

I recommend copying the file to your PDAs and when meeting squads currently in a raid, transfer the information directly to the leader of the met group...

... Found Vanka Four Fingers in the village. I hid there from a pack of dogs. Sitting, from the open cellar hearing the crackle of a Geiger counter. I immediately grabbed my gun: you never know, maybe some bandit or merc hid there. Looked, and he is lying there face down in 'Fruit Punch'. I only recognized him by the stupid bandana – red, with hammer-and-sickle emblems. And only four hours since we parted, he went ahead, and I waited for Vadik Rosy to pass the package. Shame, damn... Well, anyway, I put on a gas mask and climbed to pull him out. Couldn't understand for a long time how he fell there, after all, he's been trampling the Zone for the fourth year, until I saw that someone snapped his neck. I, plainly, immediately changed my mind about burying him in the ground. Who knows what hostess prepared canned food from an experienced stalker for herself. And whether this very hostess is grazing somewhere nearby. Quickly looted him, trying not to touch the clothes, took off the backpack, arts from the belt. Didn't take his favorite TOZ, 'Fruit Punch' ate the gun significantly. And bailed from there quickly. Vanka had only three arts: 'Droplet', 'Urchin' and these 'Grandmother's Beads' of his. 'Droplet' and 'Urchin' were dangling on his belt at the back. But 'Grandmother's Beads' landed in the 'Fruit Punch'. Thought the artifact was done for, but turned out the art is intact, only glows weirdly. Well, while I got to Freedom guys, I tested it. It became different. I called it 'Great Grandmother's Beads' to myself. Stops bleeding on the count of one. This, what's it called, raises tone. Saved from bullets nicely when I ran into a military zombie. Only started radiating stronger than 'Grandmother's Beads'. I'll probably sell it to scientists, and get myself new gear.

Record: "I have information for you. You know, I served there at our base as a clerk: sat at the computer, messed with documents and reports. And then, when our peppers started wasting your stalker brother every day, it became unbearable! Disgusting... Well okay, not about that now. I read one file there by accident... Well, like by accident... Basically, had to tinker with the code until I hacked it... Didn't copy, but remembered firmly. There was a report from eggheads about changing artifacts in anomalies! Can you imagine! So this file said that if you take some me... meso something there... called 'Great Grandmother's Beads' - stupid name, remembered immediately, just don't ask what it is, no idea - and put it in a 'Whirligig', then in ten, I think, minutes a different artifact will turn out! Well, like different... The same one, only its properties will change. It radiates some field, everything fast-flying that hits it slows down noticeably. I thought: 'That means bullets too!' It also stops blood like, improves health, only radiates. There. Hope this information helps you more than me."

... to obtain the necessary transmutation, the artifact 'Urchin' is placed in the 'Burner' anomaly. After three hours, if the transmutation is successful, it receives a very good indicator for radiation protection. Its only negative characteristic is that it increases fatigue. Our subsequent experiments showed the impossibility of further transmutation of the obtained modificate 'Porcupine' in this anomaly...

Not for distribution! Only for 'Freedom' members! Top secret, damn it! 

Vitek Rosy managed to create a new art! For the source you need a 'Porcupine', then throw it into an 'Electro', after five hours this artifact will hatch from it. Rosy named it 'Electric Porcupine', but that is, in principle, deeply equilateral. The main thing is that the art holds radiation not weakly and adds stamina. Puny, I foresee your concerned question about girls. That goes straight to the forum. Don't write to me in PM – I'll kill you! Ah, yes, achtung! Crappy! If you put on this 'Electric Porcupine', and an 'Electro' happens nearby – it will hit much harder. The art pulls electricity to itself. So be careful. Even with sockets – they shock, damn it! 

Stepan Mediacenter, infoservice, damn it.

Gentlemen! Mr. Alexey Astronomer's group rendered an invaluable service to our laboratory. The fact is that the territory near our mobile laboratory was flooded with boars and fleshes. This is their second migration wave after the last Blowout. We already had casualties among the staff. Responding to our call for help, Mr. Alexey Astronomer's group completely destroyed the mutants! We believe that monetary reward does not fully reflect the depth of our gratitude and in order to support our further cooperation, we are sending you information about the generation of the hyper-modificate 'Snotty Porcupine'. We apologize for the somewhat vulgar name, but it, invented by the creator of this hyper-modificate, describes the essence of this artifact as best as possible. I hope 'Duty' fighters possess proper sense of humor and will react adequately to this artifact and its name! To obtain the 'Snotty Porcupine', it is necessary to place the artifact 'Electric Porcupine' in the 'Fruit Punch' anomaly for two hours. I would like to note that this hyper-modificate has a rare indicator for blocking radiation. A person receives only 45 percent of the amount of roentgens he would have received without wearing this hyper-modificate on the belt. Besides this, it also very effectively stops bleeding and adds stamina. The unpleasant side of the 'Snotty Porcupine' is that it increases human sensitivity to electric shock, and it is uncomfortable to wear due to the constantly oozing incomprehensible mucus. The substance is harmless, but creepily unpleasant. In general, our team believes that such a small inconvenience as mucus will not discourage your fighters from using this hyper-modificate!\n\nSincerely, member of RAS, Academician Sakharov

Entry 1: "Barely got away from Dark Valley. Lost Yurka Buyan. The guy was torn by a vortex. Didn't notice in the shootout how a burer pushed him there with psi-strikes... May the earth be soft for him... Bad. The group is incomplete without him, less chance to carry this interesting paper to the Bar. Looks like burers dragged some poor scientist into catacombs for lunch. He wrote in his PDA that he discovered a possibility to change artifacts into new ones... modificates or something... So it seems written... Anyway, turns out some artifact of absolute class, named by him 'Giant's Little Brother', and it is made in a 'Burner' from a 'Diamond Kolobok'. The scientist wrote that this absolute not only reduces the sensitivity of the skin of the person wearing it to rupture, fire and chemically aggressive substances, but also 'diverts' from the person a quite sensitive percentage of bullets hitting the generated field. Pleasant bonuses of 'Giant's Little Brother' are the following properties: not bad removal of radiation from the body and reduction of human need for food due to feeding with its energy. Anyway, interesting information. Should take it to Sakharov and his team. Only more guards, just in case. Two groups minimum." \n\nEntry 2: "Ran into these louts from 'Freedom'! Three of us laid out five of them. Just rejoiced at the trophies – they have noble guns, when Sanka Cooler's head was blown off by a shot from SVD. We hit the sound from underbarrel launchers, but it's unclear if we whacked this sniper or not. Rinat says I should leave, he will cover me. The information is too important... The sniper, goat, doesn't give himself away with anything, a shot bird. Okay, need to go..."

Hello, Vovan. You blockhead! Why do you keep asking: "How is it in the Zone, how is it in the Zone?". No how! Boredom, damn. If we didn't catch these half-wits who trudge there for artifacts, it would be total green melancholy. No, well, it gets creepy sometimes, why should I show off to you... When some animal or god knows what howls not far from the checkpoint. Don't shit myself, but hair stands on end. Even on the ass... This despite the fact that I, like all of us here, don't let the machine gun out of my hands. Recently, though, there was entertainment. Caught a pepper. Was walking back from the Zone. Well, we took him. He was dragging some pebble with him. Glows like the bottom of your tuned Lada 9 in the dark! \n\nWell, we questioned him with prejudice. He told that this pebble is not just an artifact, but some new crap. It has like an ability to reduce chemical burns, or something. And you like become bulletproof. Well, not completely, of course. We checked this pebble with a dosimeter. Crackles, the nuisance! And this caught one tells us that like he is carrying this thing to scientists, like, for people's benefit. Opened up. Says that you take some 'Pellicle', throw it into a 'Springboard' and opa! In five hours this crap is ready. Said a lot of other things. He himself is kind of shabby, all in scars. A ghoul, basically. In short, we put him in a tachanka and sent to the third checkpoint. They'll sort him out there. Well okay, Vovan, bye. I have lineup soon here. You, pass to Yulka that I love her there, remember and all that. Anyway, be!

Gentlemen! Glad to inform you that we discovered a new sample of transmutation! Modificate 'Skin' is subjected to the influence of anomaly 'Whirligig' for 5 hours. The obtained meso-modificate with working title 'Scale' possesses the following characteristics: it reduces the impact of chemically aggressive environments on humans, improves health indicator and affects skin in a special way, making it less sensitive to gunshot wounds. Attention! Important! 'Scale' is radioactive and increases bleeding in the person wearing it! We hope that this information will help you in your noble cause, and also that this small present will strengthen our friendship and partnership even more! \n\nSincerely, member of RAS, Academician Sakharov

Comrade Major, a report came from the Center regarding the hyper-modificate 'Shell' provided by us for study. Judging by the received data, 'Shell' (meso-modificate 'Scale' reborn in the 'Fruit Punch' anomaly) on a person wearing it reduces bleeding, increases health indicator, improves resistance to gunshot wounds, neutralizes a large part of chemically aggressive media upon their contact with human skin and reduces bleeding. The only negative quality is a small radiation background. Transmutation time is small - only two and a half hours. The Center expressed a desire to receive as many objects for study as possible and new data on all possible modificates, allowing us inquiries of category 5. In connection with this, I request your permission to conduct torture of this category on captured stalkers. \n\nCaptain M. Lubyankin

I hurry to inform, Nikolai Valentinovich, that department 'B' gave us an unexpected result of their research! They discovered that if you place four artifacts of different types: 'Jellyfish', 'Droplet', 'Stone Blood' and 'Thorn' into the 'Fruit Punch' anomaly, then as a result of transmutation taking place over four hours and twenty-one minutes, an absolutely new artifact with amazing qualities is generated! This modificate, which was assigned the working title 'Symbiont', blocks 50% of psi-radiation! Experiments were conducted on prisoners who were subjected to mental attack by our captive Archibald. Making an allowance that this controller has been in our captivity for a long time and without feeding by residual energy of a Blowout, he weakened somewhat, I still consider the psi-blocking indicator excellent! Report for the Center is compiled. Waiting for your comments and permission to send data. \n\nHead of department 'B', Professor Snegirev

Report #14/7 on project 'Deceiver'
 To Director of Research Department 'K-32'
 Professor Sazonov Nikolai Dmitrievich

Dear Nikolai Dmitrievich, we have completed a series of experiments on the 'Dummy' artifact. During experiments 7 (seven) 'Dummy' artifacts underwent destruction, 5 (five) 'Dummy' artifacts underwent degradation, 1 (one) 'Dummy' artifact in a series of transmutations showed positive results. 

The 'Dummy' artifact upon placement in 'Electro' anomaly after 3 hours, 1 minute, 43 seconds receives the following characteristics: increases resistance to fire, slightly increases stamina, strengthens susceptibility to electric shock. Working title of the modificate – 'Fiery Dummy'. 

Upon subsequent placement of the 'Fiery Dummy' modificate in 'Electro' anomaly after 6 hours, 3 minutes, 12 seconds the artifact receives the following characteristics: strongly increases resistance to fire, increases stamina, strengthens carrier's susceptibility to electric shock. Working title of the meso-modificate – 'Bright Dummy'. 

Upon subsequent placement of the 'Bright Dummy' meso-modificate in 'Electro' anomaly after 8 hours, 4 minutes exactly the artifact receives the following characteristics: strongly increases resistance to fire, strongly increases stamina, strongly increases susceptibility to electric shock. Working title of the hyper-modificate – 'Moon Dummy'. 

At this, experiments on transmutation of the 'Dummy' artifact were continued in the same anomaly. Unlike projects 'Scrap', 'Sister', 'Invisible' and 'Lord of the Flies', this experiment was crowned with success! 

Upon placement of the 'Moon Dummy' hyper-modificate in 'Electro' anomaly, rejection of the artifact did not occur. After 12 hours, 3 minutes, 56 seconds the artifact received properties of absolute class, namely: significantly increases resistance to fire, slightly increases stamina, significantly increases resistance to electric shock. Working title of the absolute – 'Pudding'. 

Further placement of the obtained absolute in 'Electro' anomaly led to nothing - the anomaly rejects the artifact. 

I consider that our group arrived at a brilliant result of research on transmutation of the 'Dummy' artifact. Thus, I consider project 'Deceiver' successfully completed. Full observation records transferred to the server. 

Head of research group '7', V. A. Avakyan

"Porcupine" (modificate of radiation resistance)

Artifact "Urchin" is thrown into the "Burner" anomaly. Transmutation time is %c[orange]3 Zone hours. %c[default]The obtained modificate has the following characteristics:
 
%c[default]Radiation %c[green]-65 %
%c[default]Stamina %c[red]-18 %
 
%c[default]Probability of successful transmutation: %c[green]65% 

%c[default]Probability of degeneration: %c[red]20% 

%c[default]Probability of rejection: %c[red]15%

"Electric Porcupine" (meso-modificate of stamina and radiation resistance)

Modificate "Porcupine" is thrown into the "Electro" anomaly. Transmutation time is %c[orange]5 Zone hours. %c[default]The obtained meso-modificate has the following characteristics:
 
%c[default]Radiation %c[green]-63 %
%c[default]Stamina %c[green]+91 %
%c[default]Electroprotection %c[red]-10 %
%c[default]Shock %c[green]+5 %
 
%c[default]Probability of successful transmutation: %c[green]72% 

%c[default]Probability of degeneration: %c[red]25% 

%c[default]Probability of rejection: %c[red]3%

"Snotty Porcupine" (hyper-modificate of stamina, radiation and bleeding resistance)

Meso-modificate "Electric Porcupine" is thrown into the "Fruit Punch" anomaly. Transmutation time is %c[orange]2 Zone hours. %c[default]The obtained hyper-modificate has the following characteristics:
 
%c[default]Radiation %c[green]-55 %
%c[default]Stamina %c[green]+82 %
%c[default]Bleeding %c[green]-3332 %
%c[default]Electroprotection %c[red]-7 %
 
%c[default]Probability of successful transmutation: %c[green]74% 

%c[default]Probability of degeneration: %c[red]10% 

%c[default]Probability of rejection: %c[red]16%

"Stone Porcupine" (absolute of stamina, radiation, bleeding and electric shock resistance)

Hyper-modificate "Snotty Porcupine" is thrown into the "Springboard" anomaly. Transmutation time is %c[orange]9 Zone hours. %c[default]The obtained absolute has the following characteristics:
 
%c[default]Radiation %c[green]-50 %
%c[default]Stamina %c[green]+77 %
%c[default]Bleeding %c[green]-2918 %
%c[default]Electroprotection %c[green]+20 %
%c[default]Explosion %c[green]+7 %
 
%c[default]Probability of successful transmutation: %c[green]70% 

%c[default]Probability of degeneration: %c[red]20% 

%c[default]Probability of rejection: %c[red]10%

"Steel Kolobok" (modificate of bulletproofness and rupture resistance)

Artifact "Kolobok" is thrown into the "Springboard" anomaly. Transmutation time is %c[orange]2 Zone hours. %c[default]The obtained modificate has the following characteristics:
 
%c[default]Radiation %c[red]+7 %
%c[default]Rupture %c[green]+5 %
%c[default]Bulletproofness %c[green]+5 %
 
%c[default]Probability of successful transmutation: %c[green]70% 

%c[default]Probability of degeneration: %c[red]25 % 

%c[default]Probability of rejection: %c[red]5%

"Titanium Kolobok" (meso-modificate of bulletproofness, rupture and burn resistance)
